# themecleanR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of themecleanR is to create clean ggplots for reports

## Installation

You can install the development version of themecleanR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("DannyMRoss/themecleanR")
```

## Example

```{r example}
attach(iris)
library(ggplot2)
library(themecleanR)

# make plot
plot <- ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Sepal.Width, color=Species)) +
  labs(title="Iris Flowers", subtitle="Sepal Length vs. Width",
       x="Sepal Length", y="Sepal Width") +
  geom_point()

# standard ggplot
plot

# cleaned ggplot
plot + theme_clean()

# add notes and sources
plot + 
  labs(caption=notes_format(c("",
                              "Iris dataset: Anderson, 1936; Fisher, 1936."))) + 
  theme_clean()

plot + 
  labs(caption=notes_format(c("",
                              "Iris dataset: Anderson, 1936; Fisher, 1936."))) + 
  theme_clean()

```
